about_the_game:
Red Crucible Assault is first person shooter game that is based on the current global conflicts. You fight as a soldier while ranking up to eventually become an elite PMC operator. Battles range from the gritty battlefields of Eastern Europe to lush jungles of Southeast Asia to the frozen tundra and to the scorched sands of the Middle East and Africa. You will use the world’s deadliest hand weapons and operate high tech vehicles of war such as advanced ground vehicles, helicopters and operate killer drones.

The game features multiple game modes, including:

  • Team Deathmatch: Compete to rack up the most eliminations

  • Objective-based modes: Capture points, defend territories, or complete mission-specific tasks

  • Conquest: A multiplayer objective-based game mode where teams fight to capture and hold control points across an arena.

Players can customize their loadouts with a wide array of weapons, including assault rifles, sniper rifles, submachine guns, and exotic prototype firearms. Each weapon can be modified with attachments like scopes, grips, and extended magazines to suit individual preferences.

The progression system allows players to unlock new weapon skins, and cosmetic items as they gain experience and complete challenges. A ranked competitive mode provides a more serious environment for skilled players to test their abilities and climb the global leaderboards.

With smooth gunplay mechanics, responsive controls, and a high-skill ceiling, the game offers both casual and competitive players an adrenaline-pumping shooter experience that rewards strategy, teamwork, and individual skill.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 (AVX2 support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 8GB / 2060 SUPER 8GB / RTX 3060 8GB / RTX 4060 8GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 8GB / RX 6600 8GB / Intel® Arc™ A770 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 and 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Fight in the wars engulfing the world using the world’s deadliest weapons and combat vehicles, rank your way up by building your reputation from being a simple soldier to become an elite PMC operator.
